thread.section_title: Hotel Acropole - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and cool boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Cozy and cool boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Acropole, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: shannonrhoward
title: Cozy and cool boutique hotel
text: In the more residential 14th Arr, this is a great location for staying near the city and near public transportation. Great restaurants nearby and a little easier than trying to stay right in Paris center. The hotel staff was personal, professional and delightful. We had a Privilege room and it was very nice and right off the courtyard area. Suggest getting the breakfast buffet in the morning.
